mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Parmelee, David, II
mdRecord.dcterms:description: In 1801 there were many in the county of Washington Mississippi territory, 756 white persons and 494 slaves; does not have figures for 1805 census; believes number of families not greatly augmented though population has increased; can send further information after his return to Connecticut.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1806 February 26, Washington [D.C.] to Thomas Jefferson, n.p.
